alert.note: Alert for Haleakala Summit; Kipahulu; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Central Valley South; Maui Leeward West; Maui Windward West; South Haleakala; South Maui, Upcountry; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 1:30AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT MAUI IN MAUI COUNTY THROUGH 300 AM HST... At 129 AM HST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers and isolated embedded thunderstorms along a line extending from near Waikapu to 29 miles southwest of Manele. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 35 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kahului, Kihei, Lahaina, Honokohau, Haliimaile, Kipahulu, Wailuku, Makawao, Paia, Keokea, Olowalu, Wailea, Waihee, Kaanapali, Napili-Honokowai, Kula, Pukalani, Kapalua, Puunene, and Pauwela. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
